text: The Wild Dog Dingo () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Yuli Karasik.Лучшие фильмы, которые нужно бы показать российским детям (список)Показ советских фильмов пройдет в летнем кинотеатре на Кузьминской улицеКинопарад книг-юбиляров в Пушкинке начнётся с видеопросмотра «Дикой собаки Динго» It is based on the novel Wild Dog Dingo or the Tale of the First Love by Ruvim Frayerman. == Plot == The film tells about a girl named Tanya, who lives with her mother and falls in love with adopted son of her father, who visits their city with his new wife.Дикая собака динго == Cast == * Galina PolskikhЗвезда из коммуналки as Tanya * Vladimir Osobik as Kolya * Talas Umurzakov as Filka * Anna Rodionova as Zhenya * Inna Kondrateva as Mother * Nikolai Timofeyev as Father * Irina Radchenko as Second Wife * Tamara Loginova as Aleksandra Ivanovna (as T. Loginova) * V. Kozhevnikov * Vadim KurkovДикая собака Динго (1962) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: The Wild Dog Dingo
